GOD.content: Patoçka: Plato’s novel idea is will to leave womb of Earth Mother, follow path of “pure light,” subordinate (podřídit) orgiastic entirely to responsibility

FK.content: machine-like & faith as one and the same possibility, machine-like & sacrosanctity (heilig, holy, safe, unscathed, free, “swollen”) of the phallic effect: phallus as phainesthai, phenomenon (day of phallus) & also phantasm, fetish, specter, its double: colossal automaticity [phallic in bold 2x]
matrix of unlimited, general fetishization of Thing itself > read the unscathed as spontaneity of erection or pregnancy
[via Benveniste, via etymology, Derrida links power, vitality to swelling, to womb]

DS.content: the hystera is supposed to be “behind” the hymen, but it exposes itself only through mimicry, transference & simulacrum
dissemination, fold of hymen, somber white of cave or womb, au noir sur blanc du ventre, lieu de son émission éparse et de ses hasards sans retours [scattered emissions, chances, w/out return]
dissemination in the folds of the hymen

O.content: dissemination reads “female sexuality,” if you look closely, as a sort of womb (théorique par-dessus le marché, pour voir)

C.content: casket engenders? father’s coffin w/ maternal belly? [il faudra que je renonce à ce type d’analyse interminable]

TN.content: mouth before speaking, before orality, wouldn’t this be the mother’s lips, giving ex-

CHOR.content: matrix: 1) situation or surrounding substance in which something originates, develops 2) metal plate used for casting typefaces
